alert.note: Alert for Crittenden (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 17 at 10:13PM EDT until July 18 at 12:00AM EDT by NWS Paducah
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 945 PM CDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN CRITTENDEN...CALDWELL...NORTHERN TRIGG AND LYON COUNTIES... At 913 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Farmersville to near Woodlands Nature Station, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Princeton, Cadiz, Eddyville, Energy Lake Campground, Woodlands Nature Station, Land Between The Lakes Area, Cravens Bay Campground, Cobb, Creswell, Farmersville, Rockcastle, Kuttawa, Fredonia and Fryer. This includes the following highways... Interstate 24 in Kentucky between Mile Markers 39 and 65. Interstate 69 in Kentucky between Mile Markers 68 and 89. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
